resources.string:
Each Player Has 4 Cards in the Beginning.
 2 Cards are shown at the start of the game to each player.
 All Cards are kept Face Down.


When you Select a Card from Deck, Depending on the card,
 You can perform certain Actions, which is Assinged to that Card.
 7 and 8 : See you Own Card.
 9 and 10 : See Opponents Card.
 Jack and Oueen : Blind Swap.
 Black King : See and Swap.
 Red King : Values 0.
 Ace - 6 : No Action Assigned to these Cards.


Or can Choose not to perform said Action and discard the Card.
 The moment you discard that Card, eveyone, including you, are eligible to throw a card of same face and Number.
 The one who Discards the Card first, loses the Card while the others have to keep theirs.

 You can Discard Someone Elses Card,
 if such a case occurs,
 You can Choose any one of your card and give it to the player whose card you discarded.


Value of a Card is the same as the Card Number.
 Jack, Queen, and Black King has Value 10.


A Player wins if the has the lowest total Value.

But Remember, if you choose the 2nd Card which is to be Discarded WRONG,
 You Get an Additional Card, and as a Bonus You Get to keep the Card that you just discarded :p


When you Think You can Win, Tap KaBOOM.
